item.title: Terraform provider 0.11.0 is available
item.description:
The 0.11.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider is available. It allows disabling backups for a PostgreSQL add-on.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Terraform provider 0.10.0 is available
item.description:
The 0.10.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider is available. It fixes some bugs, introduces support for Network Groups and Pulsar. You can set a version for a PostgreSQL add-on.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Terraform provider 0.9.0 is available
item.description:
The 0.9.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider introduces support for play2 applications and git local repositories. Starting with this release, if you change an application environment variable, it will be restarted automatically.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Terraform provider 0.8.0 is available
item.description:
The 0.8.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider introduces support for FS Buckets and update for Cellar add-ons

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Terraform provider 0.7.0 is available with more resources you can update
item.description:
With 0.6.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider (compatible with OpenTofu), we introduced the support of resource update. Starting with 0.7.0 you can now apply a new plan without destroying and recreating the resource on Docker, Java, Python, Scala and Static applications.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Deploy Redis® on Clever Cloud with Terraform (or OpenTofu), update your plan
item.description:
You can now deploy Redis® add-ons using our Terraform provider, compatible with OpenTofu. The 0.6.0 release of the Clever Cloud Terraform provider also introduce the resource update. You can now apply a new plan without destroying and recreating the resource starting with PHP applications.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Deploy Keycloak and Metabase on Clever Cloud with Terraform (or OpenTofu)
item.description:
You can now deploy Keycloak and Metabase add-ons using our Terraform provider, compatible with OpenTofu.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Deploy Docker containers on Clever Cloud with Terraform (or OpenTofu)
item.description:
To manage your resources as code on Clever Cloud, from applications to add-ons (object storage, databases, etc.), you can use our Terraform provider. It’s compatible with tools such as OpenTofu and can now deploy applications using our Docker runtime.

You can define instances count or flavors, region, dependencies, ports, Dockerfile and application paths, registry credentials and more. Read the full parameters list.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider

item.title: Deploy MongoDB add-ons with our Terraform provider
item.description:
If you can deploy on Clever Cloud through our Console, our CLI (Clever Tools), or our API, you can also use Terraform and compatible tools such as OpenTofu. We maintain a provider that allows you to manage your resources as code, from applications to add-ons (object storage, databases, etc.).

We’ve recently added support for Python and Materia KV. It’s MongoDB’s turn to be available. You can now create such an add-on, choose its plan, region and get the credentials to connect to it.

  • Learn more about our Terraform provider
